name: ch.mystrom.smarthome
description: This app provides support for the following devices:

scripts.info:
npm run -s _homeyRun -- info && exit; printf "[Homey-App] 	 $npm_package_name 
 Version: 	 v$npm_package_version 
 Description: 	 $npm_package_description 
 Host: 		 ${HOSTNAME} 

Environment variables:

 "
scripts.test: npm run -s _homeyRun -- test && exit; homey app run
scripts.setup: npm run -s _homeyRun -- setup && exit; homey app install
scripts.build: npm run -s _homeyRun -- build && exit; homey app build && npm run init:app
scripts.deploy:patch: npm run -s _homeyRun -- deploy:patch && exit; npm run _dbuild -- patch && homey app publish && npm run _release
scripts.deploy:minor: npm run -s _homeyRun -- deploy:minor && exit; npm run _dbuild -- minor && homey app publish && npm run _release
scripts.deploy:major: npm run -s _homeyRun -- deploy:major && exit; npm run _dbuild -- major && homey app publish && npm run _release
scripts.init:app: npm run -s _homeyRun -- init:app && exit; npm init --quiet -y 1>/dev/null
scripts.createRepo: npm run -s _homeyRun -- createRepo && exit; hub create -d "$npm_package_description" -h $npm_package_homepage $npm_package_name && npm run init:app
scripts._dbuild: func() { git checkout master && git pull && homey app version $1 && npm run init:app && npm run __dbuild; }; func
scripts._release: npm run __dbuild && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push origin v$npm_package_version && git push origin master

author: Chris Gross <cgHome@cflat-inc.org>
